trans-unit.source: Interacts with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Samhandler med infrastruktur for node-samarbeid.

trans-unit.source: Many of the core collaboration scenarios begin with this class.
trans-unit.target: Mange av kjerner samarbeidsscenarier begynne med denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: This class is a static class – it is sealed, abstract and does not have a public constructor.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen er en statisk klasse – den er lukket, abstrakt og har ikke en offentlig konstruktør.

trans-unit.source: It is used to contain and manage application, object, and presence information for peers that have accepted invitations to a collaboration session.
trans-unit.target: Den brukes til å inneholde og behandle programmet, objektet og tilgjengelighetsinformasjon for noder som har godtatt invitasjoner til en samarbeid-økt.

trans-unit.source: In terms of peers, objects, and applications, the PeerCollaboration class provides three accessors, one for each collection, as an interface or point of connectivity for whatever else is happening on the machine.
trans-unit.target: Når det gjelder motpartene objekter og -programmer gir klassen PeerCollaboration tre aksessorer, én for hver samling, som et grensesnitt eller senterpunktet for tilkoblingen for det andre skjer på maskinen.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited; a compile-time error will occur if this sealed class is specified as the base class.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves; en kompileringstidspunktet feil oppstår hvis denne lukket klassen som er angitt som basisklassen.

trans-unit.source: Methods and properties in this class can be used to: - Launch and manage collaborative applications - Register and delete applications and collaboration objects (such as certificates, pictures, avatars, and text descriptions) - Invite peers to collaboration sessions, including items such as scope and objects which will identify them over the Internet - Allow peers to <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignOut%2A> of the collaboration infrastructure, manage lists of contacts, or publish their presence to each other - Utilize <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SynchronizingObject%2A> properties and events to coordinate asynchronous application communication, especially for changes in name, presence, application, or other objects.
trans-unit.target: Metodene og egenskapene i denne klassen kan brukes til: - Start og administrere samarbeid programmer - registrering og Slett programmer og samarbeid objektene (for eksempel sertifikater bilder, avatarer og tekstbeskrivelser av) - invitasjonen motparter samarbeid økter, inkludert elementer som omfanget og objekter som identifiserer dem via Internett - Tillat noder som <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignOut%2A>for samarbeid-infrastruktur, kan du administrere kontaktlister , eller Publiser befinner seg til hverandre - benytter <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SynchronizingObject%2A>Egenskaper og hendelser koordinere asynkrone kommunikasjon, spesielt for endringer i navnet, tilstedeværelse, programmet eller andre objekter.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SynchronizingObject%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignOut%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: "Link-local cloud", "subnet of the calling peer", and "NearMe scope" are synonymous terms.
trans-unit.target: "Koblingen lokale cloud", "delnettet til kaller peer" og "NearMe område" er samme vilkårene.

trans-unit.source: "Internet scope" and "serverless presence" are synonymous.
trans-unit.target: "Internett-område" og "uten Server tilstedeværelse" er samme.

trans-unit.source: The site-local <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpScope> has no equivalent in the collaboration namespace.
trans-unit.target: Område-lokale <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpScope>har ingen tilsvarende i navneområdet samarbeid.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpScope>

trans-unit.source: The use of every method or property in this class requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av hver metoden eller egenskapen i denne klassen krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the peer collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når økten node samarbeid starter.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo"></xref> object that contains information needed when an application is started due to a collaboration request from a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo"> </xref> objekt som inneholder informasjon om nødvendig når et program har startet på grunn av en samarbeid forespørsel fra en ekstern datamaskin.

trans-unit.source: This property is to be used by a collaboration-aware <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> instance after it is started to determine whether it was started due to a collaboration request from a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er som skal brukes av en samarbeid bruker <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>serverforekomsten når den er startet for å finne ut om den ble startet på grunn av en samarbeid forespørsel fra en ekstern datamaskin.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>

trans-unit.source: The calling application should inspect the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Data%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Message%2A> properties to get further information about the invitation request.
trans-unit.target: Programmet som kaller bør kontrollere den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Data%2A>og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Message%2A>Egenskaper for å få mer informasjon om forespørselen invitasjonen.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Message%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Data%2A>

trans-unit.source: Access to this property requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang til denne egenskapen krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>samarbeidsøkten starter.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: If the application was started due to an invitation, a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo"></xref> object that contains both information about the peer that sent the application invitation and the invitation itself is returned; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet ble startet på grunn av en invitasjon, en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo"> </xref> objektet som inneholder både informasjon om node som sendt invitasjonen programmet og invitasjonen selve er returnerte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> returneres.

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the persistent store that contains all <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> objects for remote peers.
trans-unit.target: Henter vedvarende lager som inneholder alle <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> objekter for eksterne motpartene.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> object that contains all peer contact objects for remote peers.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>objektet som inneholder alle node kontakt objekter for eksterne motpartene.

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Deregisters a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> associated with the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: Deregisters en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> tilknyttet kall node.

trans-unit.source: Peer objects are automatically deregistered (removed) from the Peer Collaboration infrastructure when a reference to the object is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: Node-objekter er automatisk registrerer ikke (fjernes) fra infrastruktur for node-samarbeid når en referanse til objektet ikke er gyldig lenger.

trans-unit.source: If a caller does not maintain a reference to the object, it is deregistered from the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en oppringer ikke har en referanse til objektet, den er registrerer ikke fra node-samarbeid-infrastruktur.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, an object can be manually deregistered by using this method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også kan et objekt være manuelt deregistered ved hjelp av denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>samarbeidsøkten starter.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> to deregister.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> ikke avregistrere.

trans-unit.source: The peerObject parameter cannot be .
trans-unit.target: Den peerObject parameteren kan ikke være .

trans-unit.source: Unable to complete DeleteObject operation.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke fullføre DeleteObject-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets all <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> objects that are registered on the local machine.
trans-unit.target: Henter alle <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objekter som er registrert på den lokale maskinen.

trans-unit.source: The caller is required to sign-in to the peer collaboration infrastructure via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method prior to the use of this method.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren må logge på node samarbeid infrastruktur via den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>metoden før bruk av denne metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: Access to this property requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang til denne egenskapen krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>samarbeidsøkten starter.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationCollection"></xref> that contains all applications that are registered on the local machine.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationCollection"> </xref> som inneholder alle programmer som er registrert på den lokale maskinen.

trans-unit.source: If an application is not found, a collection of size zero (0) is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et program ikke blir funnet, en samling med størrelsen null (0), returneres.

trans-unit.source: An invalid value was returned when this method attempted to enumerate the application registered to this peer.
trans-unit.target: En ugyldig verdi ble returnert under denne metoden forsøkte å liste opp programmet registrert på denne noden.

trans-unit.source: Please make sure that all applications have valid registry values.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller at alle programmer har gyldig registerverdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> objects that are registered on the local machine for the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av alle <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objekter som er registrert på den lokale maskinen for den angitte <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The caller is required to sign-in to the Peer Collaboration infrastructure via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method prior to the use of this method.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren må logge på node-samarbeid infrastruktur via den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>metoden før bruk av denne metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: Access to this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang til denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>samarbeidsøkten starter.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType"></xref> to return for the specified application.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType"></xref>Returnerer for den angitte applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A that contains all applications of the specified type that are registered on the local machine.
trans-unit.target: En som inneholder alle applikasjoner i det angitte type som er registrert på den lokale maskinen.

trans-unit.source: If an application is not found, a collection of size zero (0) is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et program ikke blir funnet, en samling med størrelsen null (0), returneres.

trans-unit.source: The type parameter is not set to a known value in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Den type parameteren er ikke satt til en kjent verdi i den opplisting.

trans-unit.source: An invalid value was returned when this method attempted to enumerate the application registered to this peer.
trans-unit.target: En ugyldig verdi ble returnert under denne metoden forsøkte å liste opp programmet registrert på denne noden.

trans-unit.source: Please make sure that all applications have valid registry values.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller at alle programmer har gyldig registerverdier.

trans-unit.source: Obtains all <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instances registered by the calling peer with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> infrastructure on this machine.
trans-unit.target: Henter alle <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> forekomster som er registrert ved kall node med den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"> </xref> infrastruktur på denne maskinen.

trans-unit.source: Access to this property requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang til denne egenskapen krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>samarbeidsøkten starter.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObjectCollection"></xref> which contains all the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instances registered by the calling peer with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> infrastructure on the local machine.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObjectCollection"> </xref> som inneholder alle de <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> forekomster som er registrert ved kall node med den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"> </xref> infrastruktur på den lokale maskinen.

trans-unit.source: If registered <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instances are not discovered on the local machine, a collection of size zero (0) is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis registrert <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> forekomster ikke er funnet på den lokale maskinen, returneres en samling med størrelsen null (0).

trans-unit.source: An invalid value was returned when this method attempted to enumerate all available <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: En ugyldig verdi ble returnert under denne metoden forsøkte å liste opp alle tilgjengelige <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> forekomster.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of all the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> endpoints currently signed in on the network subnet of the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en samling av alle de <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"> </xref> endepunkt som er logget på på nettverket delnett av kall node.

trans-unit.source: The return of a fully populated <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMeCollection> via this method can require an indeterminate amount of time after sign-in depending on network topology and latency.
trans-unit.target: Retur av en fullstendig fylt <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMeCollection>denne metoden kan kreve at en ubestemt tidsperiode etter pålogging avhengig topologi og ventetid.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMeCollection>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>samarbeidsøkten starter.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMeCollection"></xref> that contains all the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> endpoints currently signed into the 'Near Me' scope.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMeCollection"> </xref> som inneholder alle de <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"> </xref> endepunkt som er logget på, i nærheten-området.

trans-unit.source: If peers are not discovered on the subnet, a collection of size zero (0) is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis motpartene ikke er oppdaget på delnett, returneres en samling med størrelsen null (0).

trans-unit.source: The peer is not signed in to the 'Near Me' scope.
trans-unit.target: Motparten er ikke logget på, i nærheten-området.

trans-unit.source: An invalid value was returned when this method attempted to enumerate all known People Near Me endpoints.
trans-unit.target: En ugyldig verdi ble returnert under denne metoden forsøkte å liste opp alle kjente personer i nærheten endepunkt.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationCollection"></xref> for the local peer on the local host has changed.
trans-unit.target: Starter når en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> i den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationCollection"> </xref> for den lokale noden på den lokale verten er endret.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> associated with the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> tilknyttet kall node.

trans-unit.source: Access to this property requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang til denne egenskapen krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>samarbeidsøkten starter.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> that contains the name associated with the calling peer's endpoint (provided as the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.Name*> property).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>som inneholder navnet som er knyttet til kall motpart sluttpunktet (oppgitt som den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.Name*>egenskapen).</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.Name*></xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Unable to set LocalEndPointName.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke angi LocalEndPointName.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the name of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> on the local host for the local peer has changed.
trans-unit.target: Starter når navnet på den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> på den lokale verten for den lokale noden er endret.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObjectCollection"></xref> for the local peer on the local host has changed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> i den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObjectCollection"> </xref> for den lokale noden på den lokale verten er endret.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"></xref> of the local peer on the local host has changed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"> </xref> for den lokale noden på den lokale verten er endret.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the presence for the calling peer within the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tilstedeværelsen for kall motparten i den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"> </xref> infrastruktur.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>samarbeidsøkten starter.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"></xref> that contains presence information for the calling peer that has registered for a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> session.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"> </xref> som inneholder tilgjengelighetsinformasjon for kall peer som er registrert for en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"> </xref> økten.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"></xref> cannot specify <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"></xref>kan ikke angi<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: - <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceStatus"></xref> is offline - Unable to set <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"></xref>
trans-unit.target: - <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceStatus"></xref>er frakoblet - kan ikke angi<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"></xref>

trans-unit.source: Registers the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> for a collaboration session with the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer den angitte <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> for samarbeid økt med kall punkt.

trans-unit.source: The calling peer is required to sign in to the peer collaboration infrastructure with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method prior to calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Kall motparten kreves for å logge på infrastruktur for node-samarbeid med den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>metoden før du kaller denne metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: Access to this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang til denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>samarbeidsøkten starter.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> for which to register the calling peer within the associated scope (global, local, and link-local).
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> som du vil registrere kall motparten innenfor det tilknyttede omfanget (globale, lokale og kobling-lokale).

trans-unit.source: The type of registration to perform.
trans-unit.target: Type registrering for å utføre.

trans-unit.source: The application may be registered for just the calling peer or for all peers using the machine.
trans-unit.target: Programmet kan registreres for bare å motparten eller for alle noder som bruker maskinen.

trans-unit.source: - The property on the object passed to application is - The peer application instance provided has the same globally unique as an application which is already registered.
trans-unit.target: -Den <> *> egenskap i den objekt sendt til application er -node programmet forekomsten angitt har den samme globalt unik <> *> som et program som er allerede registrert.

trans-unit.source: The existing registration must be unregistered before a new application can be registered with the provided identifier.
trans-unit.target: Den eksisterende registreringen må avregistreres før en ny applikasjon kan registreres med den angitte identifikatoren.

trans-unit.source: The application and type parameters cannot be .
trans-unit.target: The application and type parameters cannot be .

trans-unit.source: Both parameters must be specified.
trans-unit.target: Begge parameterne må angis.

trans-unit.source: The type parameter is not set to a known value in the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Typeparameteren er ikke satt til en kjent verdi i den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: The RegisterApplication operation cannot be completed until the caller has signed-in to the infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: RegisterApplication-operasjonen kan ikke fullføres før oppkalleren har logget på infrastrukturen.

trans-unit.source: Registers a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> associated with the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> tilknyttet kall node.

trans-unit.source: This method allows the object to be queried by remote peers participating in the scope in which the object was registered.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan objektet som skal spørres ved eksterne motpartene deltar i omfanget som objektet ble registrert.

trans-unit.source: If the object was previously registered, this method updates its registration.
trans-unit.target: Hvis objektet ble registrert tidligere, oppdateres denne metoden registreringen.

trans-unit.source: If a registered object falls out of scope, it can be retrieved via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.GetLocalSetObjects%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et registrert objekt faller utenfor, den kan hentes den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.GetLocalSetObjects%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.GetLocalSetObjects%2A>

trans-unit.source: The size of the data portion of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> must be less than or equal to 16,384 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på datadelen av den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject>må være mindre enn eller lik 16 384 byte.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject>

trans-unit.source: Access to this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang til denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>samarbeidsøkten starter.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> to register.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> til å registrere.

trans-unit.source: Object already registered
trans-unit.target: Objektet er allerede registrert

trans-unit.source: - <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null." name="null." href=""></xref> - <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject.Id"></xref> cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null." name="null." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: - <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null." name="null." href=""></xref> - <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject.Id"></xref> cannot be<xref uid="langword_csharp_null." name="null." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: The SetObject operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke fullføre operasjonen SetObject.

trans-unit.source: Signs the peer into the collaboration infrastructure with the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Logger motparten i samarbeid-infrastruktur med angitt <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Display names are not necessarily unique.
trans-unit.target: Visningsnavn er ikke nødvendigvis unike.

trans-unit.source: Users should verify the identity of the person using the display name by e-mail, phone, or in person before accepting a collaboration invitation.
trans-unit.target: Brukere må kontrollere identiteten til den ved hjelp av visningsnavnet som e-post, telefon eller i egen person før du godtar en invitasjon for samarbeid.

trans-unit.source: This function signs the users into the Collaboration Infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonen logger for brukerne i samarbeid-infrastruktur.

trans-unit.source: Access to this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang til denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>samarbeidsøkten starter.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: The scope the peer is using to join the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> activity.
trans-unit.target: Omfanget motparten bruker til å bli med i <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"> </xref> aktivitet.

trans-unit.source: peerScope is set to .
trans-unit.target: peerScopeis set to .

trans-unit.source: The peerScope parameter contains an invalid enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Den peerScope parameteren inneholder en ugyldig nummereringsverdi.

trans-unit.source: The SignIn operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: Logg på-operasjonen kan ikke fullføres.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope"></xref> to which the calling peer can publish presence, capability and object information.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope"> </xref> som kall motparten kan publiseringsinformasjon tilstedeværelse, funksjonen og -objekt.

trans-unit.source: The peer host or host application may limit or differentiate peer participation in collaboration activities by using separate scopes.
trans-unit.target: Node-verten eller vertsprogrammet kan begrense eller å skille node deltakelse i samarbeid aktiviteter ved hjelp av separate omfang.

trans-unit.source: The calling peer should inspect the return value from this method to determine what further actions it can successfully perform.
trans-unit.target: Kall motparten bør kontrollere returverdien fra denne metoden for å finne ut hvilke ytterligere handlinger som det ble utføres.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope"></xref> object that specifies the scope in which the calling peer will participate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope"></xref>objekt som angir området som kall motparten vil delta.

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Signs the peer out of the specified scope.
trans-unit.target: Logger motparten utenfor det angitte omfanget.

trans-unit.source: This method is not an application-specific operation and signing out may affect other applications that may be currently running.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er ikke en programspesifikk-operasjon og avloggingen kan påvirke andre programmer som for øyeblikket kjører.

trans-unit.source: If the user is not already signed into the specified scope calling this method results in a no-op.
trans-unit.target: Hvis brukeren ikke allerede er logget på det angitte omfanget kaller denne metoden resulterer i en no-op.

trans-unit.source: When a user signs out of People Near Me, their published information is deleted from the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> endpoint object set.
trans-unit.target: Når en bruker logger av personer i nærheten, informasjonen om publiserte slettes fra den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>endpoint-objektet sett.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>

trans-unit.source: This includes <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalEndPointName%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalPresenceInfo%2A>, in addition to any identifying objects registered by the calling peer into the collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Dette omfatter <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalEndPointName%2A>og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalPresenceInfo%2A>, i tillegg til eventuelle å identifisere objekter som er registrert ved kall motparten i samarbeid-infrastruktur.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalPresenceInfo%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalEndPointName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because this information is deleted, it is no longer available to either remote peers or a peer host for collaboration.
trans-unit.target: Fordi denne informasjonen er slettet, er den ikke lenger tilgjengelig for eksterne motpartene eller en node-vert for samarbeid.

trans-unit.source: From the perspective of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> class, other sharing of the same information with trusted contacts is not relevant; use of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> class does not affect other objects in which this information was persisted, such as a remote peer <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> object.
trans-unit.target: I forhold til den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>klassen andre deler av den samme informasjonen med klarerte kontakter gjelder ikke; bruke den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>klassen påvirker ikke andre objekter som denne informasjonen er fast, for eksempel en ekstern datamaskin <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>objektet.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, deleting a peer from the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> does not affect its presence in a collaboration application; other contacts are still able to view its presence and collaborate with it.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte sletting av en node fra den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>påvirker ikke befinner seg i en samarbeid-program; andre kontakter kan fortsatt vise finnes, og samarbeide med den.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>samarbeidsøkten starter.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: Scope enumeration specified by <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Område opplisting som er angitt av <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The peerScope parameter contains an invalid enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Den peerScope parameteren inneholder en ugyldig nummereringsverdi.

trans-unit.source: The SignOut operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke fullføre operasjonen logges av.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the event handler callback object for all event handlers.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hendelsesbehandlingen tilbakeringing for alle hendelsesbehandling objekter.

trans-unit.source: An object with <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"></xref> implemented on it, to be used for application thread synchronization.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt med <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"> </xref> implementert på det skal brukes for programmet trådsynkronisering.

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Deregisters the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Deregisters angitt <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> fra den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"> </xref> infrastruktur.

trans-unit.source: Deregistering a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> stops the calling peer from receiving collaboration invitations for it.
trans-unit.target: Avregistrere avinstalleringsprogrammet en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>stopper kall motparten mottar samarbeid invitasjoner for det.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>

trans-unit.source: If the application being deregistered was not previously registered, this is a no-op.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet som registrerer ikke ikke ble registrert tidligere, er en no-op.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>samarbeidsøkten starter.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> to deregister for the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> ikke avregistrere for kall node.

trans-unit.source: The type of deregistration to perform for either the calling peer or for all peers that exist on the machine.
trans-unit.target: Hva slags avregistrering til å utføre for å motparten eller for alle noder som finnes på maskinen.

trans-unit.source: The globally unique <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id*> for the specified application does not exist or is empty.
trans-unit.target: Globalt unik <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id*>for den angitte applikasjonen ikke finnes eller er tom.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The application or type parameter is set to
trans-unit.target: The application or type parameter is set to

trans-unit.source: The type parameter is not set to a known value in .
trans-unit.target: Den type parameteren er ikke satt til en kjent verdi i .

trans-unit.source: The UnregisterApplication operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke fullføre operasjonen UnregisterApplication.
